body.p: If not disclosed elsewhere in information published with the financial statements, an entity shall describe:

li.p: the nature of its activities involving each group of biological assets; and
non‑financial measures or estimates of the physical quantities of:
each group of the entity’s biological assets at the end of the period; and
output of agricultural produce during the period.
